title: im stuck in bronze 3 and keep geting put with noobs plz help i cry all day
body: how to get up out of bronze

replies.body: Alright i was in bronze recently and the fact is, it's the luck of the draw({{champion:4}} ). But let's be real your there for a reason.

I feel you, I have been in bronze for all last year and now this year. I have come to realize he more you play the more experienced you get, the more champions you know the better you can predict what they are going to do and although I think I am good enough to climb I really am not. I always forget to look at the mini map I forget to ward and I make bad plays and decisions.. sure sometimes it is your team and there is nothing you can do .. but if you just keep playing watch some good LoL videos and streams and professional esports you will slowly get there.. I have been trying and it has payed off. (I think the biggest help is to learn from people who are much more experienced than you.. like friends who are in gold or plat or watch top of the boards players in videos and see what they do.)

I checked your history and although there are noobs in bronze, you still have a  lot to learn about the game. I'm guessing the only way to escape bronze is to play carry champs and carry yourself out. Stuff like Katarina, Yi, Hecarim, Akali and Heimerdinger wreck bronze noobies.
